casebody.data:
2001-2965 (La. 10/14/02)

STATE of Louisiana v. Charles A. BADEAUX. No. 2001-KO-2965. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 14, 2002.

In re Badeaux, Charles A.; — Defendant; Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review, Parish of Jefferson, 24th Judicial District Court Div. H, No. 94-7173; to the Court of Appeal, Fifth Circuit, No. 01-KA-406.

Denied.
